Desc.entry: Private residential care home for older people aged 65 years and over. 32 beds. Are able to take social funded residents as well. Visitors are welcome to visit the home at any reasonable time. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ContactName.entry: Maria Whittaker, Home Manager, Deputy Manager

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
